valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 13 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 14 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Developing Atlantic low moving steadily northeastwards, expected 50 miles south of Iceland 964 by midnight tonight
